snippet.title: Tom Cruise: An Unauthorized Biography
snippet.description: For all the headlines and the rumors, the real Tom Cruise has remained surprisingly hidden—until now. “Scalding.” —The New York Times * With 16 pages of photos *

snippet.title: Tom Cruise: Unauthorized
snippet.description: Includes stories of the actor's first marriage, marriage to Nicole Kidman, decision to live away from Hollywood, two adopted children, work ethics, identity as a Scientologist, and hidden sex life. 20,000 first printing. IP.

snippet.title: Tom Cruise: All the World's a Stage
snippet.description: Looks at the inside story of the making of Tom Cruise, describing his achievements and how his onscreen life is formed by his personal experiences.

snippet.title: Tom Cruise
snippet.description: Traces the life and career of Tom Cruise, and looks at his major film roles, his involvement with Scientology, and his two marriages At the age of eighteen Tom Cruise was just another pretty face amongst the 'Brat Pack' of aspiring young ...

snippet.title: Going Clear: Scientology, Hollywood, and the Prison of Belief
snippet.description: Examines the Church of Scientology; discusses the esoteric cosmology, the auditing process for determining an inductee's state of being, and the Bridge for Total Freedom; and details how the church pursues celebrities.

snippet.title: The Awe-Inspiring Beauty of Tom Cruise’s Shattered, ...
snippet.description: Originally collected in Sex, Drugs, and Cocoa Puffs and now available both as a stand-alone essay and in the ebook collection Chuck Klosterman on Film and Television, this essay is about modern films and reality.

snippet.title: The Partly Cloudy Patriot - Page 125
snippet.description: Tom Cruise Makes Me Nervous During the three-plus hours I sat in the dark watching Paul Thomas Anderson's ensemble epic Magnolia, I found myself wanting something I'd never wanted before. More Tom Cruise. As a white, middle-class ...
